channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CVS says blaming drug middlemen for higher prices is ‘deceptive rhetoric’
item.description: CVS’s stock soared toward a three-month high after its quarterly profit beat expectations by the widest margin in more than four years.

item.title: Lyft has ‘no obvious answers’ for its growth woes, as its stock declines
item.description: One issue for Lyft is a downturn in pricing trends, which numerous analysts keyed in on as they looked to make sense of the path forward.

item.title: Oil prices decline as U.S. crude supplies climb for a third week in a row
item.description: Oil futures looked to post a loss Wednesday, their first in four sessions, after official U.S. data revealed a third straight weekly climb in U.S. cru...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Why Micron’s stock is leading the chip sector’s decline
item.description: Micron CFO Mark Murphy mentioned various factors that could weigh on margins for next quarter, but he also said that period should mark the low point.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: I’m a wife and mother. Can I secretly change my will and leave everything to my daughter instead of my husband?
Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
